problem.script: from __future__ import division from loncapa import * omega="sqrt(1.5*g*cos(beta)/l)"
problem.p: Two identical rods, each of mass \(m\) and length \(l \), are joined at an angle \(2\beta \) to form a V-shaped object. This object is balanced on top of a sharp edge. What is the frequency of oscillation? In your answer type beta for \(\beta \).
